name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GradeAssist: AI Essay Grading Agent for Teachers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time with the first AI Agent for teachers, automating feedback, criteria breakdown, and auto-flagging academic dishonesty.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GradeAssist Agent is the AI essay grader that works where you work, integrating seamlessly into Google Docs, Canvas, and more, to help teachers save time grading, deliver better feedback, and reduce bias. Optimize your workflow with cutting-edge AI tools for teachers.

‚ûú Effortless Grading

‚Ä¢ Supercharge your grading and feedback writing process in one click!

‚ûú Plagiarism Detection

‚Ä¢ Keep your classroom fair and transparent.

‚ûú Grade Estimates
‚Ä¢ Get preliminary grade estimates (within ¬±5% accuracy).
‚Ä¢ Use them as a starting point for your final evaluation.

‚ûú Playback Writing
‚Ä¢ Rewind and replay the student‚Äôs writing process to see how they crafted their essay. 
‚Ä¢ Identify revisions, struggles, and potential AI assistance to provide more insightful feedback.

‚ûú Streamlined Workflow:
‚Ä¢ Open GradeAssist in the sidebar while working in Google Docs.
‚Ä¢ Seamlessly grade essays without switching tabs.

Install GradeAssist today and supercharge your grading experience with the world's first AI essay grading agent! üöÄüñçÔ∏è

‚ûú FAQs:

What is GradeAssist?
GradeAssist is the world's first AI essay grading agent for teachers. Work smarter with your own customized rubric criteria, personalized AI feedback and annotations, plagiarism check, grade estimate and AI writing detection on essays.

Why do teachers choose GradeAssist over other tools like ChatGPT?
GradeAssist Agent has advanced features for teachers that other products lack, such as the Chrome Extension Agent for grading essays in a single click, integrated plagiarism checking, and AI detection, and Playback Writing. Unlike other products, which requires manual essay uploads, GradeAssist operates directly in your browser, saving valuable time.

How is it different from ChatGPT?
GradeAssist is a specialized platform of tools designed to assist educators in grading essays with responsible and secure use of AI, whereas ChatGPT is a general purpose chatbot.

Although ChatGPT can provide general feedback on essays, it makes it hard to pinpoint specific areas for improvement. ChatGPT's performance is inconsistent and often requires tweaking prompts, leading to varied results. GradeAssist offers consistent outcomes instantly without any complicated setup and annotations so teachers can instantly see successes and issues, saving hours of time.

How does it know the criteria?
GradeAssist adapts to your unique rubric, analyzing student work solely based on the criteria you provide, ensuring accurate, personalized grading. Simply provide the level 4 section of your rubric, and GradeAssist will take care of the rest!

How accurate is the grade estimate?
Our Grade estimates are designed for precision, typically within ¬±5% of the final grade.

Doesn't AI introduce more bias?
We take pride in GradeAssist being the most fair and objective grading tool available. We believe that the professional judgement of teachers is key to fair grading, which is why our tools only use the criteria and grade level provided by the teacher to evaluate work.

We acknowledge the biases that generative AI technology may introduce, which is why we rigourously test our systems, and always remind our users that teachers are the final decision-makers.

Will GradeAssist replace teachers?
Absolutely not. GradeAssist enhances your ability to provide fair and efficient grading, reinforcing the essential role of teachers in providing the best guidance and growth for students.
